Name: Sealife Kemer Resort Hotel
Description: This wonderful hotel is located on the coast, right on the beach, and guests have the unique splendours of the Mediterranean at their feet. Guests will find Kemer town centre and the tourist centre just 5 minutes away. It is 45 km to Antalya city centre and 55 km to Antalya Airport. Guests of this establishment can enjoy privileged and outstanding service through warm, sincere, friendly, respectful and hard-working hotel staff. This hotel offers a mini supermarket, a bar and a disco, amongst other facilities. The younger guests will enjoy the children's playground and the kids' club. All rooms come with a private bathroom with shower and modern amenities to ensure utmost comfort.
